===Usage===
* [[cpp/language/asm|Declaration of an inline assembly block]]

===Example===
{{example
|1=
Note that while this example works well with GCC/Clang on x86_64 platform under Linux, it's not guaranteed elsewhere as {{c/core|asm}} declaration is {{rev inl|since=c++11|conditionally-supported and}} [[cpp/language/asm#References|implementation defined]].
|code=
#include &lt;cstring&gt;

int main() noexcept
{
    const char* const c_string = "Hello, world!\n";
    asm
    (R"(
        movq $1, %%rax                 # syscall number for sys_write
        movq $1, %%rdi                 # file descriptor 1 (stdout)
        movq %0, %%rsi                 # pointer to the c‐string
        movq %1, %%rdx                 # length of the c‐string
        syscall                        # invokes an OS system-call handler
    )"
    :                                  // no output operands
    :   "r"(c_string),                 // input: pointer to the c‐string
        "r"(std::strlen(c_string))     // input: size of the c‐string
    :   "%rax", "%rdi", "%rsi", "%rdx" // clobbered registers
    );
}
|output=
Hello, world!
}}
